DataElement.preferredName: Study Subject Milestone Administration, Management Performed Study Activity Off Study Reason Code ISO21090.DSET.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded value specifying why the subject is removed from a study. EXAMPLE(S): patient died.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Study Subject Milestone Administration, Management Performed Study Activity Off Study Reason Code
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.:An important event in the progress, development, or history of something or in someone's life.:Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active._No longer participating in a study; not being followed and will not be retreated.:An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Study Subject Milestone Administration, Management Performed Study Activity
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.:An important event in the progress, development, or history of something or in someone's life.:Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

Concepts.definition: A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.
An important event in the progress, development, or history of something or in someone's life.
Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.
Executed and carried through to completion.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: No longer participating in a study; not being followed and will not be retreated.:An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: No longer participating in a study; not being followed and will not be retreated.
An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A collection containing unordered distinct/discrete values of the type CD.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
